item.title: Trump World Sources: Joni Ernst Is Waging ‘Aggressive’ Personal Jihad Against Hegseth
item.description: Ernst has repeatedly called Trump threatening him to dump Hegseth at the same time surrogates have told Trump to tap Ernst instead.

item.title: Trump Vows To Make U.S. Steel Great Again As Debate Smolders Over Nippon Merger
item.description: Steel union members who had Trump's back in the election hope he will have theirs through the U.S. Steel deal.

item.title: NC County Rejects GOP Candidate’s Election Protests In Supreme Court Race As Second Recount Begins
item.description: The Democrat-run Wake County Board of Elections dismissed all three election protests brought by Judge Jefferson Griffin, the Republican candidate in ...

item.title: ‘100 Percent Bullsh-t’: Fox News Talent Shoot Down NBC’s Smear Campaign Against Pete Hegseth
item.description: NBC News' hit piece received immediate pushback from Hegseth's former Fox colleagues and network guests.

item.title: The Trump Transition Team Is Right To Protect Donors’ Privacy
item.description: Donor privacy is not merely a matter of convenience, but a fundamental right that enables free speech and civic engagement.
